languages.text: "Едва ли прогулку по тем руинам можно назвать приятной. Не нужен взгляд навигатора, чтобы сказать — от того проклятого места у всех душа не на месте".
languages.translation_comment:
Explored the crashed Black Ship.
Cassia: "You are surrounded by unbearably heavy colours, Master van Calox... It is as if they have been dredged up from a deep, forgotten well. It's... because of the Black Ship, isn't it?"

languages.text: "Walking around a wreck like that is not something anyone would call a pleasant experience. You don't need a Navigator's eye to know that that damned place is going to haunt us all for some time yet."
languages.translation_comment:
Explored the crashed Black Ship.
Cassia: "You are surrounded by unbearably heavy colours, Master van Calox... It is as if they have been dredged up from a deep, forgotten well. It's... because of the Black Ship, isn't it?"

languages.text: 「あのような難破船を歩き回るなど、誰だって快適な体験とは言えません。航宙士の目がなくても、あの忌まわしい場所がまだしばらく私たち全員を苦しめることになることくらい分かります」
languages.original_text: "Walking around a wreck like that is not something anyone would call a pleasant experience. You don't need a Navigator's eye to know that that damned place is going to haunt us all for some time yet."

traits.locale_text: 「あのような難破船を歩き回るなど、誰だって快適な体験とは言えません。航宙士の目がなくても、あの忌まわしい場所がまだしばらく私たち全員を苦しめることになることくらい分かります」

languages.text: "In einem Wrack wie diesem herumzugehen, würde wohl niemand eine angenehme Erfahrung nennen. Auch ohne den Blick des Navigators ist klar, dass dieser verdammte Ort uns alle noch eine Weile heimsuchen wird."
languages.original_text: "Walking around a wreck like that is not something anyone would call a pleasant experience. You don't need a Navigator's eye to know that that damned place is going to haunt us all for some time yet."

traits.locale_text: "In einem Wrack wie diesem herumzugehen, würde wohl niemand eine angenehme Erfahrung nennen. Auch ohne den Blick des Navigators ist klar, dass dieser verdammte Ort uns alle noch eine Weile heimsuchen wird."

languages.text: «Recorrer un pecio como ese no es algo que resulte agradable para nadie. No necesito el ojo de un Navegante para saber que ese lugar maldito nos atormentará a todos durante un tiempo».
languages.original_text: "Walking around a wreck like that is not something anyone would call a pleasant experience. You don't need a Navigator's eye to know that that damned place is going to haunt us all for some time yet."

traits.locale_text: «Recorrer un pecio como ese no es algo que resulte agradable para nadie. No necesito el ojo de un Navegante para saber que ese lugar maldito nos atormentará a todos durante un tiempo».

languages.text: “身处这样的残骸之中，恐怕不会有任何人觉得舒服。就算没有导航者之眼也能看得出来，那个地方的诅咒很长时间都会阴魂不散。”
languages.original_text: "Walking around a wreck like that is not something anyone would call a pleasant experience. You don't need a Navigator's eye to know that that damned place is going to haunt us all for some time yet."

traits.locale_text: “身处这样的残骸之中，恐怕不会有任何人觉得舒服。就算没有导航者之眼也能看得出来，那个地方的诅咒很长时间都会阴魂不散。”

languages.text: "Böyle bir enkazın etrafında dolaşmak, hiç kimse için keyifli bir deneyim değil. O lanet yerin daha uzun bir süre yakamızı bırakmayacağını anlamak için bir Rotacı gözüne gerek yok."
languages.original_text: "Walking around a wreck like that is not something anyone would call a pleasant experience. You don't need a Navigator's eye to know that that damned place is going to haunt us all for some time yet."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle bir enkazın etrafında dolaşmak, hiç kimse için keyifli bir deneyim değil. O lanet yerin daha uzun bir süre yakamızı bırakmayacağını anlamak için bir Rotacı gözüne gerek yok."

languages.original_text: "Walking around a wreck like that is not something anyone would call a pleasant experience. You don't need a Navigator's eye to know that that damned place is going to haunt us all for some time yet."

languages.text: « Faire le tour d'une telle épave n'est pas ce qu'on peut appeler une expérience agréable. Nul besoin de l'œil d'un navigateur pour savoir que cet endroit maudit va nous hanter encore longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "Walking around a wreck like that is not something anyone would call a pleasant experience. You don't need a Navigator's eye to know that that damned place is going to haunt us all for some time yet."
